translations: n.爱唠叨的人；尽找岔的人

phrs.translation: 爱唠叨, 爱唠叨的人, 爱找茬的人, 爱叨的人

sentences.sentence: I think you are being a nagger today.
sentences.translation: 我认为你今天特别爱找岔。

sentences.sentence: Many men are even afraid that their girlfriend may turn into a full time nagger after marriage.
sentences.translation: 很多男人特怕女朋友结婚后变成“全职唠叨狂人”。
